author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...POORLY ORGANIZED DEPRESSION MOVING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD ACROSS THE BAY OF CAMPECHE...
summary: ...POORLY ORGANIZED DEPRESSION MOVING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD ACROSS THE BAY OF CAMPECHE... As of 10:00 PM CDT Sat Jun 28 the center of Two was located near 19.7, -95.1 with movement WNW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1011 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...POORLY ORGANIZED DEPRESSION MOVING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD ACROSS THE BAY OF CAMPECHE... As of 10:00 PM CDT Sat Jun 28 the center of Two was located near 19.7, -95.1 with movement WNW at 8 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1011 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Depression Two (AT2/AL022025)
